author: mbrain
content: It isn't clear to me how 4844 will interact with the Builder API. The Builder specs are fork versioned and currently reference e.g. Bellatrix.ExecutionPayload. The ExecutionPayload includes an additional field (excess_data_gas) in 4844. Seems like we will need to update the Builder specs.

author: kanagwa
content: Thanks, yes you can view the blob data as hex, utf8 string and base64 image
